title: Multifunctional chitosan tailored γ-aluminum oxy-hydroxide monolith aerogels for sustained environmental remediation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00697F, Paper
Prashant D. Sarvalkar, Anuj S. Jagtap, Apurva S. Vadanagekar, Suhas S. Kamble, Arati P. Tibe, Arif D. Sheikh, Rajiv S. Vhatkar, Kiran Kumar K. Sharma
Chitosan-tailored γ-AlOOH aerogels effectively remove dyes and heavy metals from water. With high recyclability and adsorption capacity, they offer an efficient, sustainable solution for industrial wastewater treatment.
